result.name: Analysis and relevance of genetic variability of ruminant retroviruses (BLV, BFV, SRLVs) in terms of pathogenesis and diagnosis of infection and virus transmission
result.description: The project is oriented to study the infectivity of small ruminant lentiviruses (SRLVs) to epithelial cells in milk of goats  and to analysis of genes encoding Toll-like receptor (TLR) on blood leukocytes of SRLV-infected goats with different levels of infection. The results will provide data on innate immunity in the course of SRLV infection.
result.center: National Veterinary Research Institute, 24-100 Pulawy, Poland
